text: The following is a conversation with Robert Sapolsky, a primatologist and author of several books, including Behave: The Biology of Humans at Our Best and Worst.
The following is a conversation with Daniel Kahneman, a psychologist and author of Thinking, Fast and Slow.
The following is a conversation with Malcolm Gladwell, journalist and author of several books, including Outliers, The Tipping Point, and David and Goliath.
The following is a conversation with Thomas Piketty, economist and author of Capital in the Twenty-First Century and Capital and Ideology.
The following is a conversation with Cal Newport, author of several books, including Deep Work and Digital Minimalism.
The following is a conversation with Nassim Nicholas Taleb, philosopher and author of several books, including The Black Swan and Skin in the Game.
